uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.osgi.impl

Class ServiceWrapperManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.osgi.impl.ServiceWrapperManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.framework.hooks.service.EventListenerHook, org.osgi.framework.hooks.service.FindHook, ServiceWrapperManager

    public class ServiceWrapperManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceWrapperManager
    This implementation will automatically pick up and apply any implementations of ServiceWrapper which are themselves registered as a service.

    • Method Detail

      • addServiceWrapper

        public void addServiceWrapper(ServiceWrapper<?> serviceWrapper,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> serviceProperties)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceWrapperManager
        Add a wrapper to the manager. Existing services may be wrapped at this point according to the configuration of the wrapper.
        Specified by:
        addServiceWrapper in interface ServiceWrapperManager
        Parameters:
        serviceWrapper - The ServiceWrapper instance to register.
        serviceProperties - The service properties of the service wrapper.

      • removeServiceWrapper

        public void removeServiceWrapper(ServiceWrapper<?> serviceWrapper)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceWrapperManager
        Unregister a service wrapper from the manager. This will have the side effect of removing all instances of wrapped services from the service registry, which could mean services in use are removed.
        Specified by:
        removeServiceWrapper in interface ServiceWrapperManager
        Parameters:
        serviceWrapper - The ServiceWrapper instance to unregister.

      • modifyServiceWrapper

        public void modifyServiceWrapper(ServiceWrapper<?> serviceWrapper,
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> serviceProperties)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceWrapperManager
        Unregister a service wrapper from the manager. The effects of the new properties will be propagated immediately to any wrapping services as appropriate.
        Specified by:
        modifyServiceWrapper in interface ServiceWrapperManager
        Parameters:
        serviceWrapper - The ServiceWrapper instance to update.
        serviceProperties - The updated service properties of the service wrapper.
